text: Khosrow Shir Mosque is related to the Seljuq dynasty and is located in Razavi Khorasan Province, Khosrow Shir. == Sources == == Gallery == File:Khosrow Shir 02.jpg File:Khosrow Shir 01.jpg File:Khosrow Shir 25.jpg File:Khosrow Shir 15.jpg File:Khosrow Shir 06.jpg File:Khosrow Shir 03.jpg File:Khosrow Shir 24.jpg File:Khosrow Shir 09.jpg Category:Mosques in Iran Category:Religious buildings and structures with domes Category:National Works of Iran
title: Khosrow Shir Mosque
